title: No child node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab.
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, there is no child node listing.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:  
1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement.  
2. Select a data source that has no database/table/column information.  
  
Actual Results:  
When changing the data source for the data set, there is no child node listing in the data set editor page of the query tab. Close the data set editor and reopen it.
